text: Le Pigeon is a French bistro in Portland, Oregon's Buckman neighborhood, in the United States. Chef Gabriel Rucker opened the restaurant in 2006 at age 25. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:2006 establishments in Oregon Category:Buckman, Portland, Oregon Category:French-American cuisine Category:French-American culture in Oregon Category:French restaurants Category:Restaurants established in 2006 Category:Restaurants in Portland, Oregon
title: Le Pigeon
